heroSubtitle: A clear, structured approach to transforming your IT operations
intro: We don't just 'take over your IT' — we follow a proven process that stabilises your environment, reduces risk, and sets you up for long-term success. Here's exactly what to expect when you work with us.

phases.title: Discovery & Audit
phases.description: We start by understanding where you are. Our free IT audit covers your infrastructure, security posture, backup status, and pain points. No sales pressure — just an honest assessment of your current state.
activities: Initial discovery call to understand your business
Documentation of existing systems and contracts
deliverables: IT Audit Report with findings and recommendations

phases.title: Stabilise
phases.description: Before we can optimise, we need to stabilise. This phase addresses critical risks and gets foundational tools in place. We fix the things that are most likely to cause problems first.

phases.title: Standardise
phases.description: With the foundation stable, we implement consistent standards across your environment. This is where you start seeing the benefits of proactive management — fewer issues, faster resolution, better documentation.

phases.title: Optimise
phases.description: Once stable and standardised, we focus on continuous improvement. Regular reviews identify opportunities to improve performance, reduce costs, and align IT with your business goals.

principles.title: No Surprises
principles.description: We communicate proactively. You'll know about issues before they become problems, and you'll never be surprised by a bill.

principles.title: Documentation First
principles.description: Everything is documented. If we get hit by a bus, another team could pick up where we left off. Your knowledge isn't locked in our heads.

principles.title: Prevention Over Cure
principles.description: We'd rather spend time preventing problems than heroically fixing them. Less drama, more uptime.

principles.title: Honest Advice
principles.description: We'll tell you what you need to hear, not what you want to hear. Sometimes that means recommending against spending money.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: The first step is a conversation. Book your free IT audit and let's see where you stand.
